member.name: T:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient
member.summary: A client responsible for connecting as a Webhook.

member.summary: Creates a new Webhook Discord client.

member.summary: Creates a new Webhook Discord client.

member.summary: Creates a new Webhook Discord client.

member.summary: Creates a new Webhook Discord client.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.#ctor(Discord.IWebhook,Discord.Rest.DiscordRestConfig)
member.summary: Creates a new Webhook Discord client.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.#ctor(System.String,Discord.Rest.DiscordRestConfig)
member.summary: Creates a new Webhook Discord client.
member.param: The configuration options to use for this client.
member.exception: Thrown if the is an invalid format.
Thrown if the is null or whitespace.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.SendMessageAsync(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Discord.Embed},System.String,System.String,Discord.RequestOptions,Discord.AllowedMentions)
member.summary: Sends a message to the channel for this webhook.
member.returns: Returns the ID of the created message.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.ModifyMessageAsync(System.UInt64,System.Action{Discord.Webhook.WebhookMessageProperties},Discord.RequestOptions)
member.summary: Modifies a message posted using this webhook.
member.remarks: This method can only modify messages that were sent using the same webhook.
member.param: A delegate containing the properties to modify the message with.
The options to be used when sending the request.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous modification operation.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.DeleteMessageAsync(System.UInt64,Discord.RequestOptions)
member.summary: Deletes a message posted using this webhook.
member.remarks: This method can only delete messages that were sent using the same webhook.
member.param: The options to be used when sending the request.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous deletion operation.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.SendFileAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Discord.Embed},System.String,System.String,Discord.RequestOptions,System.Boolean,Discord.AllowedMentions)
member.summary: Sends a message to the channel for this webhook with an attachment.
member.returns: Returns the ID of the created message.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.SendFileAsync(System.IO.Stream,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Discord.Embed},System.String,System.String,Discord.RequestOptions,System.Boolean,Discord.AllowedMentions)
member.summary: Sends a message to the channel for this webhook with an attachment.
member.returns: Returns the ID of the created message.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.ModifyWebhookAsync(System.Action{Discord.WebhookProperties},Discord.RequestOptions)
member.summary: Modifies the properties of this webhook.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient.DeleteWebhookAsync(Discord.RequestOptions)
member.summary: Deletes this webhook from Discord and disposes the client.

member.name: T:Discord.Webhook.WebhookMessageProperties
member.summary: Properties that are used to modify an Webhook message with the specified changes.

member.name: P:Discord.Webhook.WebhookMessageProperties.Content
member.summary: Gets or sets the content of the message.
member.remarks: This must be less than the constant defined by .

member.name: P:Discord.Webhook.WebhookMessageProperties.Embeds
member.summary: Gets or sets the embed array that the message should display.

member.name: P:Discord.Webhook.WebhookMessageProperties.AllowedMentions
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed mentions of the message.

member.name: M:Discord.Webhook.WebhookClientHelper.GetWebhookAsync(Discord.Webhook.DiscordWebhookClient,System.UInt64)
member.exception: Could not find a webhook with the supplied credentials.
